record.column2Description: Specify the prefix for quotes, orders and invoices.

record.column1Description: Add new business units. Edit and deactivate business units. Change the parent business unit.
record.column2Description: Set the format for various values, such as numbers, the calendar and currency.

record.column1Description:
Add new users. Edit information about users and deactivate user records.
Manage the teams and roles assigned to users.

Add new teams and new team members to existing teams.
Modify the team description and delete members from teams.

record.column1Description: Set the privacy preferences for the organisation.
